content: The specification for the $evaluate-measure extended operation doesn't include any way to pass parameters to the evaluated library (other than Measurement Period, through the periodStart and periodEnd parameters). For one of our use cases, we need to pass parameters to the library. Should such a mechanism be added to the spec?
Yes, we have done that with a Parameters parameter that binds by name to the parameters in the library. Would you mind submitting a tracker for that in Jira?
